item.title: CVE-2024-25906|2024-06-04T17:35:03.536Z -- wp%20happy%20coders -- comments%20like%20dislike
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in WP Happy Coders Comments Like Dislike allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Comments Like Dislike: from n/a through 1.2.2.
